SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,P.PRODUCT_NUMBER,P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER,P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE,P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION,P.PRODUCT_PRICE,P.PRODUCT_SALES, P.PRODUCT_RELEASE_DATE,PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NUMBER,PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NAME,PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_UUID FROM ( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NUMBER,P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER,P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION,P.PRODUCT_PRICE,P.PRODUCT_SALES,P.PRODUCT_RELEASE_DATE, JPI.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NUMBER,JPI.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NAME,JPI.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_PATH, JPI.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_UUID FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN JPI ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = JPI.PRODUCT_NUMBER
WHERE P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (1, 2)
WHERE P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (3, 4)
WHERE P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (5, 6)
WHERE P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (7, 8)
WHERE P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER == 9
ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_RELEASE_DATE DESC ) P
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_SALES, PRODUCT_RELEASE_DATE, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NUMBER, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_UUID, CATE, rnk FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_SALES, PRODUCT_RELEASE_DATE, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NUMBER, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_UUID, CATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CATE ORDER BY PRODUCT_RELEASE_DATE DESC) AS rnk FROM ( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_SALES, P.PRODUCT_RELEASE_DATE, JPI.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NUMBER, JPI.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NAME, JPI.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_PATH, JPI.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_UUID, CASE WHEN PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (1, 2) THEN 1 WHEN PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (3, 4) THEN 2 WHEN PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (5, 6) THEN 3 WHEN PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (7, 8) THEN 4 WHEN PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (9) THEN 5 END AS CATE FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN JPI ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = JPI.PRODUCT_NUMBER ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_RELEASE_DATE DESC ) )
WHERE RNK <= 5

SELECT COUNT(P.PRODUCT_NUMBER) FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT P
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN(1,2)
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN(3,4)
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN(5,6)
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN(7,8)
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER = 9

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_RAW_MATERIAL, P.PRODUCT_NET_WEIGHT, P.PRODUCT_ALCOHOLICITY,P.PRODUCT_AREA, P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, P.PRODUCT_DISTILLERY, P.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, PC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME, IM.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NUMBER, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_UUID FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN IM on P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = IM.PRODUCT_NUMBER INNER JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER = PC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER WHERE P.PRODUCT_NUMBER=#{productNumber}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_RAW_MATERIAL, P.PRODUCT_NET_WEIGHT, P.PRODUCT_ALCOHOLICITY,P.PRODUCT_AREA, P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, P.PRODUCT_DISTILLERY, I.PRODUCT_IMG_NUMBER, PRODUCT_IMG_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_UUID FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_IMG I on P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = I.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE P.PRODUCT_NUMBER=#{productNumber}
